attachment.altText: In the top of the page there's a sentence written in wingdings: "DARK, DARKER, YET DARKER. In the bottom there's a black and white watercolor paint of the character W.D. Gaster. He's painted with rough brush strokes. He's looking to the viewer with a smile and only one small white pupil on the left eye.
